family.description: Specifying the larger category or group to which the collection belongs

image.description: A URI pointing to a resource with mime type image/* that represents the collection, typically displayed as a profile picture for the collection.

banner_image.description: A URI pointing to a resource with mime type image/* that represents the collection, displayed as a banner image for the collection.

featured_image.description: A URI pointing to a resource with mime type image/* that represents the featured image for the collection, typically used for a highlight section.

external_link.description: The external link of the collection.

properties.description: Arbitrary properties. Values may be strings, numbers, object or arrays

items.description: An array of authors who created or contributed to the asset.
